title: Plug in
text: Plug in the values for the equation. Choose a point to be the $$x_2$$ and $$y_2$$ pair, and use the other as the $$x_1$$ and $$y_1$$ pair. We get $$\sqrt{{\left(7-\left(-4\right)\right)}^2+{\left(4-\left(-5\right)\right)}^2}=\sqrt{202}$$.

title: Simplify
text: Simplify the answer into one term. There is no way to further simplify $$\sqrt{202}$$.
